channel.title: Dylan Servilla - ScummVM Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ScummVM Blog on Dylan Servilla

item.title: Hello, ScummVM!
item.description: Hi! I’m Dylan Servilla, and this summer I’m going to be working on ScummVM’s Macromedia Director engine as a GSoC student. Director was used to create a ton of multimedia from the late ’80s to early ’00s, and I think it’s important that we save this digital history from software rot. In particular, I hope to help the engine reach full support for Spaceship Warlock and The Journeyman Project in the near future.
